Our lead engineer, Sterling Forest, was in charge of building the course editor for an online education company.

Drag & Drop

The course editor allows users to drag and drop multimedia elements - includng videos, custom animations and images - both from the user's desktop and from inside the Versal browser console.

The course editor allows users to drag and drop multimedia elements - includng videos, custom animations and images - both from the user's desktop and from inside Versal's browser console.
